details.title: Commercial technology & avionics architecture
details.abstract: As commercial technology has become more embedded in the military community, there have been attendant effects caused by the rapid progress in technology and by obsolescence. Industry has generated many solutions to mitigate these effects, but their limitations are emerging with time. This is a discussion of higher-level approaches to obsolescence solutions and technology insertion problems that have not hitherto been addressed.
details.journal_title: IEEE Aerospace and Electronic Systems Magazine
